title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor.10/01/2001 11:38:21.
OB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update. A busy cursor should be shown while updating. NOTES:
EB: The checked state of the table takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update. During this process, a busy cursor should be displayed. NOTES:
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Observe the time it takes for the checked state of the table to update.
3. Confirm that a busy cursor is displayed during the update process.
